fields.name: Load Example List from String

fields.name: Tab Delimited String Table Representation
fields.description: System.String

fields.name: Format
fields.description: Use letters to declare input column meaning: 'W'=word, 'L'=lemma, 'M'=msd and 'F'=frequency. Use '_' to declare not important column. For example, format 'W_LM' specifies that words are in the first column, lemmas are in the third column and msds are in the fourth column. Word and lemma specifiers are required, msd and frequency are optional.

fields.name: Ignore Example Frequencies
fields.description: True if frequencies are to be ignored. False if frequencies of elements of a group should be summed together.

fields.name: Msd Consideration
fields.description: Specification how algorithm grouping considers msd tags.

fields.name: Ignore            (Completely ignores mds tags - join examples with different tags and sum their weihgts)
Distinct          (Same examples with different msd's are not considered equal and joined)
JoinAll           (Joins examples with different tags - concatenates all msd tags)
JoinDistinct      (Joins examples with different tags - concatenates just distinct msd tags - somehow slower)
JoinSameSubstring (Joins examples with different tags - new tag is the left to right substring that all joined examples share)
Create Lemmatizer Settings
fields.description: Automatically generated widget from function ConstructLemmatizerSettings in package lemmagen. The original function signature: ConstructLemmatizerSettings.

fields.name: Use From In Rules
fields.description: True if from string should be included in rule identifier ([from]->[to]). False if just length of from string is used ([#len]->[to]).

fields.name: Msd Consideration
fields.description: Specification how algorithm considers msd tags.

fields.name: Ignore            (Completely ignores mds tags - join examples with different tags and sum their weihgts)
Distinct          (Same examples with different msd's are not considered equal and joined)
JoinAll           (Joins examples with different tags - concatenates all msd tags)
JoinDistinct      (Joins examples with different tags - concatenates just distinct msd tags - somehow slower)
JoinSameSubstring (Joins examples with different tags - new tag is the left to right substring that all joined examples share)
Max Rules Per Node
fields.description: How many of the best rules are kept in memory for each node. Zero means unlimited.

fields.name: Build Front Lemmatizer
fields.description: True: build proccess uses few more hevristics to build first left to right lemmatizer (lemmatizes front of the word); False: (default) do not create additional front lemmatizer;

fields.name: Store All Full Known Words
fields.description: True: the model will store all known words in full -> the same as having lexicon to check each word before using lemmatizer and then use the lemmatizer only for unknown words; False: (default) the model will try to mimimize the size and will store the full forms of words only in the case if they add new knowledge;

fields.name: Load Table From File
fields.description: This is a common widget for loading a simple text (e.g. tab separated) file as table.

fields.name: Raw Text File
fields.description: Input Text File: Contains one table row per line

fields.name: Delimiter
fields.description: Delimiter used to split columns in a line (e.g. comma, tab).

fields.name: First Line is Header
fields.description: If true then widget parses first line of file as column headers.

fields.name: Header Line
fields.description: If 'firstLineIsHeader' is set to false then widget tries to parse this paramater as header line.

fields.name: Skip Empty Lines
fields.description: If true, empty lines in the input string are ignored (usefull also for eliminating a trailing newline in a document).
